name: Youtube Video Planning | Notion Template
description: What is this?Everything you need to script, publish and promote your videos on YoutubeHow to use this:After checkout, you'll be redirected to a Notion page. Click 'Duplicate' in the top right of the page and get going! Plan: Sketch the basic information of your video.
